overview: The guidos are back, and this time they're in Hollywood! Jersey Score 2 stars Billy Heights as Mike "The Stimulation" and Jimmy Clay as "Nookie." Derrick Vinyard returns as "D-Wow" and heads up a studly cast of Jersey meat-heads who find out that living together in the Hollywood hills is not only loads of fun, but also a nut-busting good time. Connor Maguire steals the show as "DJ Pauly G" and his crazy guido outbursts: "T-Shirt Time! The Cabs Are Here! Burgers for the Boys! Busted!" Sharing is definitely caring in this house.
tagline: The guidos are back, and this time they're in Hollywood!
title: Jersey Score 2
